
# Type Predicates

## Use
 - to type unknown values (e.g. from an API)
 - to ensure correct type after filtering
 - narrow down the exact type from a type union

## Sources:
 - https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/2/narrowing.html#using-type-predicates
